articles.title: From local to global: What made top news in Singapore over the last 180 years?
articles.summary:
📰 지역에서 글로벌로 : 지난 180 년 동안 싱가포르에서 최고의 뉴스를 만든 이유는 무엇입니까?
📝 The Straits Times Log In Manage 계정 구독 로그 아웃 로그 아웃 : 지난 180 년 동안 싱가포르에서 최고의 뉴스를 만든 이유는 무엇입니까?뉴스는 무엇입니까?180 년의 FR을 되돌아보십시오...
articles.content: The Straits Times  Log in  Manage account Subscribe Log out    From local to global: What made top news in Singapore over the last 180 years? What makes the news? A look back at 180 years’ worth of front-page headlines – from the very first edition of The Straits Times on July 15, 1845 – shows that news is everywhere: from right at your doorstep to the world beyond and more. BY CHEE WEIXIAN, ELIZABETH LAW AND LEE PEI JIE | PUBLISHED: JULY 15, 2025   Toa PayohChoa Chu KangOrchardPunggolClementiAn

articles.title: Your S’pore Story: ‘We wore red and white so people would know what Singapore’s colours are’
articles.summary:
📰 당신의 s'pore 이야기 :‘우리는 빨간색과 흰색을 입었으므로 사람들은 싱가포르의 색이 무엇인지 알게되었습니다.’
📝 당신의 s'pore 이야기 :‘우리는 빨간색과 흰색을 입었으므로 사람들은 싱가포르의 색상이 무엇인지 알게되었습니다....
articles.content: Your S’pore Story: ‘We wore red and white so people would know what Singapore’s colours are’Some of this educator’s smoothest moves are representing the country in a global street dance competition and mentoring the next generation of the local locking communityFind out what’s new on ST website and app.Educator Ian Poh channels his love for street dance into teaching and mentoring youth, using the art form to engage and empower the next generation.PHOTO: SPH MEDIAFollow topic:ST180Published May

articles.content: The Straits Times  Log in  Manage account Subscribe Log out           Telling the Singapore story for 180 years The Straits Times commemorates its 180th anniversary with a slew of activities including a celebratory gala dinner, a roving exhibition and the launch of a new website and app. BY ESTHER LOI, GAVIN FOO, JASON QUAH and KEVIN LIM | PUBLISHED JULY 16, 2025   Scroll downFrom the smell of the freshly printed morning newspaper, to the notification ping from a cellphone signalling the arrival
